title: FightGame1 SoundEffect
longDescription:
https://youtu.be/xVY1uWXhiAY < Youtube Preview


📖Overview.


The 'FightGame1 SoundEffect' Pack is a comprehensive collection designed for game, movie, and animation projects featuring combat scenes such as martial arts, boxing, and close-quarters combat. This pack offers 716 high-quality audio clips that amplify the intensity of fight scenes. Encompassing a diverse range of effects including Bodyfall, Bone, Break, Brutality, Fatality, Gore, Special, Strike, UI, Voice, and Whoosh, this pack is crafted to enhance the impact of your projects.


🕹️Functionality.

  • Diverse Sound Effects: The pack covers an extensive array of fight-related sounds, capturing the essence of different combat scenarios.
  • Stereo and Mono: Audio files are categorized as stereo and mono, providing flexibility in choosing between UI effects or location-specific in-game sounds.
  • Blending Ordinary and Special Effects: Some sounds are a fusion of ordinary elements and special effects, making them versatile across various thematic settings including medieval, modern, futuristic, and sci-fi.

⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.

  • Reselling and using for AI training purposes are explicitly prohibited. It must be used as part of personal and corporate projects only.
